text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(And so Doto and I ended up helping manage things for our cool 
and cute little Demon Queen!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sooooorryyyyyyy!! I'm such a hopeless, 
useless, good-for-nothing clutz～!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Aaaaah! Please calm down, Doto-san…! 
I-It's fine! It's totally fine!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Look, we still have cloth, needles, and 
threads!! I prepared a lot just in case!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
But we've already used up a fifth of all the materials…! I'm so 
sorry, I keep ripping up the cloth, bending the needles, and 
shredding the threads…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But how you still continue to help out without giving up is worth 
its weight in gold, no twice its weight! However…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Since we don't have much experience making costumes, 
trying to make these Demon Queen Servant costumes 
might be too difficult for us.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
They're part of Demon Queen Windy-chan's army, 
so their costumes have to be this flashy!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Good grief, what pitiful servants you are. 
For you see, I…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: You are…

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
…Am not making ANY progress either. 
Sewing is so haaaard!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
Making clothes takes much longer than I thought! Digital, at our 
pace, how long do you think it will take us to finish one?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Aye! With the Digitan Brand Deadline Calculation Method, I will 
calculate the exact date of our completion. Beep beep beep…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
……Calculation complete! 
Lend me your ear. Whisper whisper whisper…

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hmm hmm! I see, I see. So basically…

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: WE'RE NEVER GONNA MAKE IT!!!!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I know it's presumptuous of me to say this, 
since I keep holding you back, but…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Why don't we try looking for more people to help with the 
project? I'm sure things would go more smoothly if we do…!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
If someone wants to join, then I'm not against it. 
But I don't want to look for help myself!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah, b-but….

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
I said I don't want to! That's the end of this conversation!! 
I'm gonna work over there!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text:
…Doto and Digital are fine, I don't want to deal with anyone else… 
I mean, they're probably gonna make fun of me anyway.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
………… 
Uhm… Digital-san. I have a favor to ask…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Eh? Ah, yes!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Hah hah hah!! 
Not yet, not yet!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Daryaaaa!!! 
See ya lateeer!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Aargh～ You really got me there! 
Good running, Helios.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Wei wei first fuuu～～!! 
But Palmer-chi, ya were lookin real worn out back there? 
Like super burned out?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…Was it obvious? Well, my training regimen's 
been increasing lately. The autumn season races 
are almost here, so I have to do my best.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
The news is already all over how McQueen and Ryan are 
participating in the big races. While that was happening, I also 
decided on my first race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I will neither lose to those two, nor to you, Helios! 
We're running in the same race, so 
I'll make sure to win with all I've got!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
I hear ya girl! I ain't taking an L either! 
Get ready to eat my dust, Palmer-chi!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: (Is what I want to happen, but…)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hmm… huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Something on your mind, Helios?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Digital-san, thank you so much for designing this…! 
I hope some people will be interested 
when they see this flyer.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I hope so too. You surprised me though. I didn't think you would 
gather allies behind Windy-chan-sama's back.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I don't think we should be giving up… I want to be able execute 
Windy-chan's project exactly like she imagined it.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
B-but in the end, that won't be possible with just Digital-san 
helping. Ehehe… thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: No no, it's nothing much, really. This isn't much at all…

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Weiyooo～ Whatchall up to?☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
"Demon Queen Windy-chan Castle Project"!?!? Sheesh! Godly! I mean 
Demonly! I wanna know more～～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, so it's an All Hooves' Day exhibit! It's that time of year 
already, huh. Are you guys still looking for more members?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
We are…! Uhm uhm… Palmer-san, Helios-san, would… would you be 
willing to join us…?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Bet! We're joining periodt!! Right, Palmer-chi!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Eh? Wait, Helios!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
It's fine, it's fine, you gotta get away racing from time to time 
too. You're working too hard! Fr fr.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
I remember applying to "Tracen Academy", not to "Demonic Super 
Dasher Training Academy"!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
It's high key time to live that "Student life"! Live that Tracen 
Uma Musume life! I think!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Helios… yeah, but…

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
AND ALSO! The Palmer-chi that I know is a gyaru Goated with 
niceness and would never say no at a time like this!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ugh! …Kuh～～

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…Doto, Digital, tell Windy this: 
"There are two who wish to join the Demon Queen Army."

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …! I will! I'll make sure she hears it!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Wei wei! 
You're sauced out today, Palmer☆

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, oh you! …Thanks for that, Helios.
